features: Double-Sided Lighted Mirror: This 1X/10X compact magnifying mirror equipped with 24 daylight LEDs. Not only is it equipped with 12 LED lights on the 1X mirror, also 12 LED lights on the 10X magnifying mirror. The lights on both sides can be controlled separately to meet your various makeup needs

Rechargeable Travel Mirrors: 750mAh large battery capacity, only takes 1-2 hours to fully charge, It can work continuously in the brightest state for 2.5 hours, in the middle state for 5 hours, in the darkest state for 15 hours, don’t worry about the trouble of charging frequently

Energy Saving Design and Memory Function: This led mirror will automatically turn off after 15 minutes without any operation, preventing you from wasting battery power by forgetting to turn off the lights. The next time you use it the brightness and colour temperature will be the same as the last time you used it
Magnetic Switch and Touch Dimming: Intimate magnetic switch design, very easy to open and won’t hurt your nails. Long press the touch button to adjust the light brightness, Soft Light, CRI > 83
Awesome Gift: We choose beautiful packaging, It is excellent makeup gift, for makeup lovers, Valentine's Day, Christmas, useful and adorable
